document_data.name: ''Mortal Strike''
document_data.creator: [[Oghma]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mortal Strike''''' was the favored weapon of [[Oghma]], the [[god]] of knowledge in the [[Faer√ªnian pantheon]].
document_data.Powers: It was said to be a ''+3 longsword'' with no obvious special powers or a ''+5 [[dancing]] [[defending]] [[longsword]]''. He could summon it into his hand whenever he had need and he was specialized in its use.
